description:
While on vacation in Hawaii, the gang find themselves hunting for the scandalous bikini thief that`s stolen the girls` swimwear! With everyone else having fun in the sun, Ataru, Sakura, and Cherry end up taking in a little too much of the local cuisine.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hawaiian Mizugi Dorobou / Jigoku no Full Course
Hawaiian Swimsuit Thief / Full Course from Hell
Le voleur de maillot de bain de Hawaï / L`orgie du diable
ハワイアン 水着ドロボウ - 地獄の フルコース
